participant_abstract.sent: The meeting followed an odd course: it seemed that myself (user interface designer) and industrial designer had reached a good conclusion that what we wanted was a smooth minimalist, simple, cost-effective remote control in plastic or titanium.
This was then disrupted by the marketing expert insisting that the trends are now demanding spongy and fruit and veg... so we had to rethink and reach a compromise on what design we wanted.

participant_actions.sent: Designers: make prototype out of modelling clay.

participant_decisions.sent: Few buttons, but 4 'compass point' buttons instead of a scroll wheel *. fruit n veg and spongy is just not feasible *. keep company colours.

participant_problems.sent: Fruit and veg themes is crazy!
